name: Toss it!
description:
How to play pick and put objects into CORRECT containers (highlighted in the start), click on "danger events" to neutralize them and click on the tiny human to calm her down.

#TossIt! is a short game we created for the #DreamArcadeArchive jam. Why? Because this could actually be one of Jerry's dreams - an invisible hand that cleans! A game where you have to take care of a tiny human. She runs around the apartment and tosses stuff on the ground. Can you help her put the things where they belong and also keep her safe?

Features
  • Controlled by Mouse (hit Enter to start)
  •  Pick up items and put them where they belong
  • Neutralize dangers as they appear
  • Calm the tiny human, if she becomes spooked
  •  Get the maximum high score before your time runs out!
 Thanks for playing and let us know your high score in the comments!
